name: Boulder Breaker - Demo Release
description:
Hey there mate, you're playing as a guy who has probably worked out for YEARS...

You're (YES YOU), You're on a quest to smash as many boulders as you possibly can, 

also taking an adventure around the whole entire world of thick solid crime and mischief by some pretty thick solid men, you have to beat their asses up and save the world and much more!

You're called Crusher in this game, I bet your ass you can do this!

Genre: Action/Adventure/Fighting

Rumbold_Devs

By Ethan Rumbold
